mapper.insert: insert into kh_user(id, upass, uname, uemail, uphone, ubirth, ugender) values(#{id},#{upass},#{uname}, #{uemail}, #{uphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ubirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ugender})
mapper.select: select count(*) from kh_user where id = #{id}
select id from kh_user where uemail = #{uemail}
select * from kh_user where id = #{id} and upass= #{upass}
select id from kh_user where uemail = #{email}
mapper.update: update kh_user set upass = #{upass} where id=#{id}
update kh_user set authnum=#{authnum} where email=#{uemail}
